function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in a healthcare setting.","Mitigation":"Regular testing and maintenance of robots, along with strict safety protocols and human oversight.","Technologies":"Sensor technology, AI monitoring systems, and remote diagnostics.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Hospital administrators, robot manufacturers, and maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care.","Impact":"Decreased monitoring and attention to individual patient needs, potentially leading to overlook of symptoms and issues.","Mitigation":"Training of healthcare workers to integrate robots into patient care, and clear protocols for human-robot collaboration.","Technologies":"AI monitoring systems, human-robot interaction technology, and training programs.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients.","Owner":"Hospital administrators, healthcare training institutions."},{"Description":"High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment.","Impact":"Inadequate disinfection measures in healthcare facilities, increasing the risk of infection transmission.","Mitigation":"Establishing regional production hubs, increasing production capacity, and regulatory support for expedited deployment.","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, production automation, and regulatory compliance technology.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility administrators, robot manufacturers, and government agencies."}]}
